column3: O-Oh, you're here already! I was just taking an innocent look around. Promise.
I think you're right about a cavern! If we had the right tools, we could break through this rock and see what's inside. Could be anything, right? Gold, riches...emergency exits...
The mammet-sized spelunking tools recipe has been added to the sanctuary crafting log. Deliver this set of tools to the determined digger once it has been crafted.
Once you've prepared the right tools, give them to me and we'll see what's in this cavern. Maybe it's a secret way off the island! Ha ha! That was a joke!
...A-Are you giving these to me? Is it really okay to find out what lies beyond this wall?

Open the cavern wall?
<UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>※Once the cavern has been opened, the area cannot be returned to its previous state.<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Thank you... Oh, thank you, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! We'll dig like no mammet has ever dug before. For the future. For liberty!
B-But don't you care about the gold!? The riches!? Th-They could be down there, you know! I'm only trying to help further your profits!
There was a cavern after all. ...A fully sealed cavern with sturdy and impenetrable walls.

I-I'm sure you'll find lots of useful things in here! Things we can collect for you and make for you and sell for you. Day in and day out. ...E-Excuse me, I need a moment to myself. Enjoy your new cavern, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>.
The crumbling caverns have been added as a location for granary foraging expeditions.
You're a visitor here, aren't you!? ...Tell me, what is your moral stance on smuggling someone off of an island? G-Generally speaking, of course!
